origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.get_policy_documents', 'description': 'This function retrieves the latest policy documents related to foreign exchange market regulation.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'documentType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of policy document, e.g., foreign_exchange_regulation.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year of the policy document.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'documents', 'description': 'The list of policy documents retrieved.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.get_policy_documents, 它的参数输入如下: 'documentType'是'foreign_exchange_regulation', 'year'是'2024'.
